scripts.build_2: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.kickstart: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev_2: npm run dev --prefix frontend && npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'added-vercel_json_for_output' && git push videoapp master
